  • Uses of Arrangement in org.jfree.chart.block

    Classes in org.jfree.chart.block that implement Arrangement
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    BorderArrangement
    An arrangement manager that lays out blocks in a similar way to Swing's BorderLayout class.
    class 
    CenterArrangement
    Arranges a block in the center of its container.
    class 
    ColumnArrangement
    Arranges blocks in a column layout.
    class 
    FlowArrangement
    Arranges blocks in a flow layout.
    class 
    GridArrangement
    Arranges blocks in a grid within their container.

    Description
